radiographic_examinations.findings: chronic interstitial lung disease with possible pneumonitis
clusters of branching nodular opacities in a tree-in-bud pattern, small bilateral pleural effusions, dilatation of the main pulmonary artery, and cardiomegaly

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: ultrasound examination of the renal allograft
radiographic_examinations.findings: a well-demarcated, hypoechoic parenchymal focus without a clear relationship to the collecting system, no evidence of hydronephrosis
three T2-weighted hyperintense lesions, two in the upper pole and one in the lower pole, with surrounding T2-weighted hypointense signal resembling a cyst
